Class ListRefreshingHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.list.util.ListRefreshingHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, FlowContext.Handler<Object>
public class ListRefreshingHandler
extends Object
implements FlowContext.Handler<Object>

Refreshes ListWidget(s) on finish and/or on cancel.

Author:
Anton Kuzmin (anton.kuzmin@webmedia.ee)

Constructor Detail

ListRefreshingHandler

public ListRefreshingHandler(ListWidget<?>... lists)
Refreshes lists on finishing and/or canceling a flow.

Parameters:
lists - ListWidgets to be refreshed.

ListRefreshingHandler

public ListRefreshingHandler(boolean handleCancel,
                             boolean handleFinish,
                             ListWidget<?>... lists)
Refreshes lists on finish and also on cancel if appropriate parameters are set to true.

Parameters:
handleCancel - if true, the lists will be refreshed on cancel.
handleFinish - if true, the lists will be refreshed on finish.
lists - ListWidgets to be refreshed.

ListRefreshingHandler

public ListRefreshingHandler(ListRefreshingHandler.Handle handle,
                             ListWidget<?>... lists)
Refreshes lists on finish and/or on cancel depending on the handle parameter.

Parameters:
handle - The enum value that describes, in which case the lists will be refreshed.
lists - ListWidgets to be refreshed.
Since:
2.0
